content: Kawa is basically a Java editor developed by Tek-Tools. It does not include wizards and GUI tools, best suited to experienced Java programmers in small and midsized development teams. It looks that there is no new development for Kawa.
stemmed: kawa basic java editor develop tek-tool . It includ wizard gui tool , best suit experienc java programm small midsiz develop team . It look new develop kawa .
